title: Ancient Wisdom
desc:
*Did you know that reading is bad for you?*

Halves the enemy's HP, but then stuns you for 5 whole turns, even bypassing immunities to do so. Be very careful if you ever decide to use this, and ensure you have plenty of health (and maybe Absorption too) before doing anything crazy.

Obtaining this nets you 300 bonus points... But good luck doing so.

Not consumable. You may read this book as many times as you'd like.

Worthless against Ancient Lunar Gods.
